Ingredients.1: 1.5 cups Italian Tipo 00 flour, or more to taste

Ingredients.3: 2  egg yolks, or more as needed

Directions.1: Pile flour onto a work surface and make a small well in the center; place eggs, egg yolks, olive oil, and salt into the well. Gently stir the egg mixture with a fork, gradually drawing in flour until dough comes together.

Directions.2: Knead dough with hands until smooth and leathery, about 10 minutes.

Directions.3: Wrap dough in plastic wrap; let rest until malleable, 1 to 2 hours. Remove plastic wrap.

Directions.4: Cut dough into four pieces; roll out with a rolling pin. Run flattened pieces through a pasta roller to create desired noodle shape.
